header.title: Who are we?
header.aboutus: Access Barrier UK Ltd, Design, Manufacture and Install Automatic Barriers, Automatics Sliding Gates, Cantilever Gates, Telescopic Sliding Gates, Turnstiles, Manual Barriers, Manual Parking Barriers, Height Restriction Barriers and Automatic Swing Gates. Based in Halesowen in the West Midlands we offer friendly advice to anyone considering purchasing gates or barriers to their residential or commercial property and getting you a cost effective solution for your requirements. With our skilled fabricators and design office we can design and manufacture a custom built gate or barrier to suit your requirements.
header.contactDetail: If you are interested in a gate or barrier and would like to get more information on pricing, design please contact us.
header.contactAddress: Unit 3G/2 Halas Industrial Estate, Forge Lane, Halesowen, West Midlands, B62 8EB
